title: New & Video: Fthrsn – On Our WAY
body: New material from **[Fthrsn](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9222-new-fthrsn-nothings-the-matter-colors/ "New: Fthrsn – Nothing’s the Matter // Colors")** AND a new video. Wowza, and to think I thought this day wasn’t going to get any better than me sitting in my bed, half naked, eating chicken wings. What a fool I was. But yeah, check the vid; kid sure can dance.
